name: Reference - Detecting DDoS Attack Using Snort
x_kb_abstract: A DDoS (Distributed Denial-of-Service) attack is very common and easy toexecute and does not require any sophisticated tools. It can happen to anyone. In this project we deploy snort in our home network as a NIDS (Network Intrusion Detection System) to detect a DDoS attack and prevent it.
x_kb_organization: Indian Institute of Information Technology Allahabad
